title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.21 - Admission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.21 - Admission

State Regulations

The formal acceptance by an institution of a patient who
is to be provided with room, board, continuous nursing service, and other
institutional services while lodged in the institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
